product_overview: ProjectF1 is a mobile application designed for Formula 1 enthusiasts, providing a comprehensive platform for community engagement, news updates, and race-related content.
core_goals: Create an engaging platform connecting Formula 1 fans
Provide real-time F1 news updates and race information
Enable community discussions and social interactions
Offer a merchandising section for official F1 products
Ensure high performance and offline capabilities for a seamless user experience
key_features: Community Hub with threaded discussions supporting text and images, real-time updates, and engagement actions (like, repost, bookmark)
User Profiles with customizable avatars, favorite team selection, activity history, and social follow system
Live F1 News Feed with article categorization, media support, sharing, and bookmarking
Race Information including upcoming race schedules, circuit details, practice/qualifying sessions, and driver standings
Social Engagement System with likes, reposts, comments, bookmarks, and notifications for activity and race reminders
F1 Shop Integration offering official merchandise and purchase tracking
Authentication system supporting email/password, social login, and optional two-factor authentication
Dark/Light mode support and accessibility features
Offline capabilities with content caching and action queueing
user_flow_summary: User logs in or signs up via the Auth Modal with email/password or social login
User navigates the Home Screen and selects categories using animated radio cards
User views community threads, creates posts, replies, and interacts using engagement buttons
User accesses their Profile Modal to view or edit profile information and activity
User reads latest F1 news articles and bookmarks favorites for later
User checks race calendar and driver standings from respective screens
User explores the Shop screen to browse and purchase merchandise
User receives notifications for new posts, race reminders, and mentions
User views threads in detail and replies inline for community engagement
validation_criteria: App loads within 3 seconds initially and screen transitions take less than 300ms
Real-time updates propagate to users within 5 seconds
Engagement buttons respond with animation and haptic feedback correctly
Profile and authentication modals function across supported platforms
Offline reading mode caches content reliably and queues user actions
Security features including encrypted transmission, session management, and optional two-factor authentication are implemented
Community discussions support text and image content with proper categorization
News feed supports rich media and sharing functionality
Shop integration tracks purchases and displays product information accurately
